tool.name: AutoCycler Subsampling
tool.description: subsample long reads for downstream assembly

param.name: reads
param.label: Input long reads (FASTQ)
param.help: Input long reads in FASTQ format

param.name: genome_size
param.label: Estimated genome size
param.help: Estimated genome size in bp (e.g., 5m for 5 megabases)

param.name: count
param.label: Number of subsampled read sets
param.help: Number of subsampled read sets to output

param.name: min_read_depth
param.label: Minimum read depth
param.help: Minimum allowed read depth for subsampling

param.name: seed
param.label: Random seed
param.help: Seed for random number generator (0 for random)

tool.help:
**AutoCycler Subsampling Tool**
This tool subsamples long reads for downstream assembly using AutoCycler.
**Inputs**
- Input long reads in FASTQ format - Estimated genome size (e.g., "5m" for 5 megabases) - Output directory name
**Parameters**
- Number of subsampled read sets: How many different subsampled sets to create (default: 4) - Minimum read depth: Minimum coverage depth to maintain (default: 25x) - Random seed: Seed for reproducible results (default: 0 for random)
**Outputs**
- A collection of subsampled FASTQ files
